4. Two jackscrew, 180 degree apart shall be provided in one of the flanges for all orifice flange and specified spectacle blind assemblies.

B7M, XYLAR 2 + XYLAN 1070 coated with minimum combined thickness of 50μm Hex Nuts ASTM A 194 Gr. 2HM, XYLAR 2 + XYLAN 1070 coated with minimum combined thickness of 50μm Gasket ASME B 16.20, 4.5mm, SS316/SS316L Spiral Wound with Flexible Graphite (F.G.) filler Valves Rating 150#, RF Ball BSRA1R, BSFA1R Gate GAWA1R Globe GLSA1R Check CHPA1R CSWA1R, CDPA1R
Notes
1. PMS to be read in conjunction with Piping Design Basis, Doc No. 50502-SPE- 80000-PP-BD-0001 and Valve Material Specification, Doc. No. 50502-SPE- 80000-PP-SP-0002.
2. Weld Joint Factor for welded pipe shall be as per ASME B 31.3.
3. Welded fittings shall be 100% radiographed.
4. Two jackscrew, 180 degree apart shall be provided in one of the flanges for all orifice flange and specified spectacle blind assemblies.
5. Spectacle blinds and spacer sizes and rating that are not available in ASME B 16.48 shall be as per manuf. standard. Design shall be submitted to Company for review and approval.
6. Maximum temperature limit for all Soft Seat Ball Valve shall be 200°C.
7. Wafer check valve to be avoided, unless the available space constraint does not allow normal check valve.
